verses.verse: And Ya`akov <WH3290> lifted up <WH5375> <WH8799> his eyes <WH5869>, and looked <WH7200> <WH8799>, and, behold, Esav <WH6215> came <WH935> <WH8802>, and with him four <WH702> hundred <WH3967> men <WH376>. And he divided <WH2673> <WH8799> the children <WH3206> unto Leah <WH3812>, and unto Rachel <WH7354>, and unto the two <WH8147> handmaids <WH8198>.

And he put <WH7760> <WH8799> the handmaids <WH8198> and their children <WH3206> foremost <WH7223>, and Leah <WH3812> and her children <WH3206> after <WH314>, and Rachel <WH7354> and Yosef <WH3130> hindermost <WH314>.

And he passed over <WH5674> <WH8804> before them <WH6440>, and bowed himself <WH7812> <WH8691> to the ground <WH776> seven <WH7651> times <WH6471>, until he came near <WH5066> <WH8800> to his brother <WH251>.

And Esav <WH6215> ran <WH7323> <WH8799> to meet him <WH7125> <WH8800>, and embraced <WH2263> <WH8762> him, and fell <WH5307> <WH8799> on his neck <WH6677>, and kissed him <WH5401> <WH8799>: and they wept <WH1058> <WH8799>.

And he lifted up <WH5375> <WH8799> his eyes <WH5869>, and saw <WH7200> <WH8799> the women <WH802> and the children <WH3206>; and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Who are those <WH428> with thee? And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, The children <WH3206> which 'Elohim <WH430> hath graciously given <WH2603> <WH8804> thy servant <WH5650>.
Then the handmaidens <WH8198> came near <WH5066> <WH8799>, they and their children <WH3206>, and they bowed themselves <WH7812> <WH8691>.

And Leah <WH3812> also with her children <WH3206> came near <WH5066> <WH8799>, and bowed themselves <WH7812> <WH8691>: and after <WH310> came <WH5066> Yosef <WH3130> near <WH5066> <WH8738> and Rachel <WH7354>, and they bowed <WH7812> <WH8691> themselves.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, What meanest thou by all this drove <WH4264> which I met <WH6298> <WH8804>? And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, These are to find <WH4672> <WH8800> grace <WH2580> in the sight <WH5869> of my lord <WH113>.
And Esav <WH6215> said <WH559> <WH8799>, I have <WH3426> enough <WH7227>, my brother <WH251>; keep that thou hast unto thyself.

And Ya`akov <WH3290> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Nay, I pray thee, if now I have found <WH4672> <WH8804> grace <WH2580> in thy sight <WH5869>, then receive <WH3947> <WH8804> my present <WH4503> at my hand <WH3027>: for therefore I have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> thy face <WH6440>, as though I had seen <WH7200> <WH8800> the face <WH6440> of 'Elohim <WH430>, and thou wast pleased with me <WH7521> <WH8799>.

Take <WH3947> <WH8798>, I pray thee, my b'rakhah <WH1293> that is brought <WH935> <WH8717> to thee; because 'Elohim <WH430> hath dealt graciously with me <WH2603> <WH8804>, and because <WH3605> I have <WH3426> enough <WH3605>. And he urged <WH6484> <WH8799> him, and he took <WH3947> <WH8799> it.
And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let us take our journey <WH5265> <WH8799>, and let us go <WH3212> <WH8799>, and I will go <WH3212> <WH8799> before thee.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, My lord <WH113> knoweth <WH3045> <WH8802> that the children <WH3206> are tender <WH7390>, and the flocks <WH6629> and herds <WH1241> with young <WH5763> <WH8802> are with me: and if men should overdrive <WH1849> <WH8804> them one <WH259> day <WH3117>, all the flock <WH6629> will die <WH4191> <WH8804>.

Let my lord <WH113>, I pray thee, pass over <WH5674> <WH8799> before <WH6440> his servant <WH5650>: and I will lead on <WH5095> <WH8691> softly <WH328>, according as <WH7272> the cattle <WH4399> that goeth before me <WH6440> and the children <WH3206> be able to endure <WH7272>, until I come <WH935> <WH8799> unto my lord <WH113> unto Seir <WH8165>.

And Esav <WH6215> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let me now leave <WH3322> <WH8686> with thee some of the folk <WH5971> that are with me. And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, What <WH4100> needeth it? let me find <WH4672> <WH8799> grace <WH2580> in the sight <WH5869> of my lord <WH113>.
So Esav <WH6215> returned <WH7725> <WH8799> that day <WH3117> on his way <WH1870> unto Seir <WH8165>.

And Ya`akov <WH3290> journeyed <WH5265> <WH8804> to Sukkot <WH5523>, and built <WH1129> <WH8799> him an house <WH1004>, and made <WH6213> <WH8804> booths <WH5521> for his cattle <WH4735>: therefore the name <WH8034> of the place <WH4725> is called <WH7121> <WH8804> Sukkot <WH5523>.

And Ya`akov <WH3290> came <WH935> <WH8799> to Shalem <WH8004>, a city <WH5892> of SH'khem <WH7927>, which is in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, when he came <WH935> <WH8800> from Padanaram <WH6307>; and pitched his tent <WH2583> <WH8799> before <WH6440> the city <WH5892>.

And he bought <WH7069> <WH8799> a parcel <WH2513> of a field <WH7704>, where he had spread <WH5186> <WH8804> his tent <WH168>, at the hand <WH3027> of the children <WH1121> of Hamor <WH2544>, SH'khem's <WH7927> father <WH1>, for an hundred <WH3967> pieces of money <WH7192>.
And he erected <WH5324> <WH8686> there an altar <WH4196>, and called it <WH7121> <WH8799> Elelohe-Yisra'EL <WH415>.
